participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

condition.Description: A type of trial condition presented to the participant.

Levels.incongruent: Target arrow aligned in the opposite direction as the flanking arrows.
Levels.congruent: Target arrow aligned in the same direction as the flanking arrows.

accuracy.Description: Whether the participant responded correctly or incorrectly.

reaction_time.Description: Time between cue presentation and the participant's response.
